title: Scp 8642 3
content:
At this point you’re just wasting time, and you can’t even say why. You came here to do a job, and you’re going to do it! Yessir, just gotta knock on that door, ask some questions about their expenses, and get back to your office. Your boss might even promote you for finding the department that two others couldn’t! I mean, probably not, but you can dream, right? Ok, now is the time! You lift your hand one final time, and…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/5 You knock on the door.]||= 3||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/4 You don’t knock on the door.]||

-----

author: TopHatBionicle
